printa_delivery.title: Ctrl + P = Problem. Solving the hassle of printing.
printa_delivery.subtitle: Let's solve printing!
printa_delivery.summary:
Printing has always proved to be a major headache for everyone, especially for artists, designers, and architects. It’s time consuming and difficult. That’s why we had a big challenge to solve printing.

Enter: Printa Delivery. Printa solves the hassles of printing and guarantees the best quality and delivery.

mapps.title: Mapps360 organizes real estate agents lives.
mapps.subtitle: Who's more disorganized than real estate agents?
mapps.summary:
You probably know some real estate agents, right? Aren’t they absolutely lovely people, but terribly organized? They are ferocious sellers but have problems organizing all of their work.

Enter: Mapps360. Mapps360 is a real estate marketing and sales tools that organizes all of the agent’s workflow. It automates time consuming and repetitive processes and provides solid analytics to the agent. They just have to concentrate on selling… Cool!

jpc.title: Time For a Change
jpc.subtitle: Presenting the New JP Casabianca Website
jpc.summary: Winter is coming and it was time for a change. I decided to update my website and use it as an experiment to use Django Rest Framework with Nuxt.js.
jpc.cta: Learn Why and How I Redesigned
